item.description:
Sunday February 1 (8th as backup).
CROSS COUNTRY SKI AND SNOW SHOE
TC: Frances Schuss, fschuss6@comcast.net (preferred) & 781-279-0672
before 9pm or David Goldsmith, dgoldsmith38@aol.com

EVENT: Enjoy over 10 miles of machine groomed ski trails at Great Brook
Farm State Park in Carlisle. The Park has a number of beginner and intermediate
trails that explore farmlands, woods as well as the streams and ponds of Great Brook
Farm State Park. Areas are set aside for snow shoeing as well. The Center includes a
rustic lodge heated by wood stoves and filled with picnic tables. Bring a snack and
some liquid refreshment for out on the trail. Some of us intend to stop for an early
dinner in Carlisle on the way home. Check Great Brookâ€™s web site for directions, ski
conditions and other information, http://www.greatbrook...
MEET: 11 AM in the Barn over at a picnic table by the ski rentals.
RSVP: By 1/29 is Required by email or phone to either of the Trip Coordinators
at the contact information provided above.
COST: $12 trail fee, $13 for rentals (if needed), $5 for non-members, plus the cost
for a dinner for anyone who wants to join us.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be meeting a picnic table over by the ski rentals

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: XC skiing at Great Brook Farm in Carlisle
